title: Hera's Revival PathⅠ
desc: Hera dreamed of a vision, and Loki appeared, offering assistance.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Hera’s  Revival Path I

title: Hera's Revival PathⅡ
desc: Hera moved forward and encountered Apollo, who had been blocking her way all along.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Hera’s  Revival Path II

title: Hera's Revival PathⅢ
desc: After getting rid of Apollo, Hades followed closely behind.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Hera’s Revival Path III

title: Hera's Revival PathⅣ
desc: Hera and Loki arrived at a new location, where they found Cupid waiting for them.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Hera’s Revival Path IV

title: Hera's Revival PathⅤ
desc: Hera discovered that Icarus had also arrived, intending to seize a treasure, leading to a competition between them.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Hera’s  Revival Path V

title: Hera's Revival PathⅥ
desc: Loki finally revealed her true intentions; she wanted to take Hera's blood to unlock the Seventh Divine Realm.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Hera’s Revival Path VI

title: Cupid’s Revival PathⅠ
desc: Cupid finds herself transported to another realm, where she encounters Icarus, who has come to stir up trouble.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Cupid’s Revival Path I

title: Cupid‘s Revival PathⅡ
desc: Cupid grumbles about Icarus backing out at the last moment. At this point, Gemini appears, stating that they too want to contest Cupid for power.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Cupid’s Revival Path II

title: Cupid’s Revival PathⅢ
desc: Prometheus arrives, declaring that he has come to test Cupid, who gladly accepts the trial.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Cupid’s Revival Path III

title: Cupid‘s Revival PathⅣ
desc: Chaos makes a dramatic entrance, mocking Cupid with snarky remarks, but ultimately gets defeated by Cupid.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Cupid’s Revival Path IV

title: Cupid’s Revival PathⅤ
desc: Cupid then encounters the lost Michael, who offers to help Cupid test his strength.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Cupid’s Revival Path V

title: Cupid‘s Revival PathⅥ
desc: Cupid meets his ultimate rival, Apollo, who, as usual, challenges Cupid to a contest of archery.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Cupid’s Revival Path VI

title: Ra's Revival PathⅠ
desc: Ra arrived at the Genesis Sanctuary through meditation but encountered her rival, Chaos, causing trouble.

title: Ra's Revival PathⅡ
desc: Chaos transformed into the form of Venus, trying to force Ra to soften her heart, but Ra saw through her deception and defeated her.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Ra's Revival Path I

title: Ra's Revival PathⅢ
desc: Ra met Prometheus, who guarded the entrance, and he stated that he would test her. Ra gladly accepted.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Ra's Revival Path II

title: Ra's Revival PathⅣ
desc: Chaos began causing trouble again, transforming into Horus to disrupt Ra’s will, but Ra ultimately defeated her.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Ra's Revival Path III

title: Ra's Revival PathⅤ
desc: Amaterasu appeared, stating her intention to compete with Ra for the path guided by the sun, leading both to decide to settle it with a battle.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Ra's Revival Path IV

title: Ra's Revival PathⅥ
desc: Finally, Chaos decided to face Ra in a final showdown, but Ra emerged victorious in the end.
unlock_desc: Unlocked after completing Ra's Revival Path V
